name: Freethought [Australia] (IAPSOP)
content:
Freethought [Australia] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Freethought (Australia) Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Freethought. A Monthly Journal of Freethought, Spiritualism, Mesmerism, etc / A Monthly Journal of Free and Advanced Thought, Psychology, Metaphysics, Spiritualism, &c. 1880—1880 Monthly Sydney, Australia. Publisher: Edwin Cyril Haviland (1853- ). Editor: Charles Bright. 1/1, February 1880-2/5, December 1880(?) 50 pp. Carried supplement: Catalogue of the Library of the Psychological Society of N.S. Wales. Devoted primarily to free thought but with significant contributions on Mesmerism and spiritualism. Bright's wife later helped edit the Harbinger of Light. BL. Issues:Freethought V1 N2 March 15 1880
